comments:
If you have not checked the current selection in the import dialog for pde 
selfhosting you will get a index out of bounds exceptions

STEPS
1) Install org.eclipse.pde.selfshosting 1.12
2) Select Import - Plugins
3) Select a plugin but do not check it.
4) Select Add Required Plugins

Exception

Log: Mon Jan 28 14:35:03 EST 2002

Fixed in PDE version of self-hosting (but not in JDT standalone plug-in). 
PDE version is available since build 20020129 by renaming plugin.xml.new into 
plugin.xml in org.eclipse.pde plug-in.
